subject: Algebra
title: Introduction to Sets and Functions
openingStatement: We will learn the basics of how sets are used in mathematics, as well as how we can define functions between them.
exerciseStatement: Consider the function \(g:\{1,2\} \to \{1,2,3\}\) defined by \(g(1) = 3\) and \(g(2) = 1\).
author: Mark Richard
